item.title: Npc int >.<
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

same here plz… =[

if(i == 72) { // NPC ID
aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; <-- what’s this?
class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Collect original NPC data <— & this
class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; <— & this
class5.aStringArray66[1] = “Attack”; <— & this
class5.aByte68 = 4; <— & this
class5.anInt91 = 110;//width <— & this
class5.anInt86 = 90;//height <— & this
class5.anIntArray94 = new int[3]; // Number of models the NPC uses <— & this kinda explain this one better >.< kinda nooby at the custom npc’s…

class5.anIntArray94[0] = 10013; // <— & this
class5.anIntArray94[1] = 10128; // <— & this
class5.anIntArray94[2] = 10186; // <— & this
class5.aString65 = “Mithril Dragon”; // NPC name <— & this
class5.anInt61 = 304; //combat level <— i know this
class5.aByteArray89 = “A scary dragon made of mithril”.getBytes(); // NPC description <— and i know this too… thanks if you can help… me learn npc int and custom model int…
}
